trans-unit.source: .NET Core Tools Telemetry
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 工具遥测

trans-unit.source: .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET 核心

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Tools Telemetry
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 工具遥测

trans-unit.source: The .NET Core Tools include a [telemetry feature](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/pull/2145) that collects usage information.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 工具包括可收集使用情况信息的[遥测功能](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/pull/2145)。

trans-unit.source: It’s important that the .NET Team understands how the tools are being used so that we can improve them.
trans-unit.target: 让 .NET 团队了解工具的使用情况非常重要，我们可由此对其做出改进。

trans-unit.source: The data collected is anonymous and will be published in an aggregated form for use by both Microsoft and community engineers under the [Creative Commons Attribution License](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
trans-unit.target: 收集的数据是匿名的，并以聚合形式发布，供 Microsoft 和社区工程师在 [Creative Commons Attribution 许可证](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)下使用。

trans-unit.source: Scope
trans-unit.target: 范围

trans-unit.source: The `dotnet` command is used to launch both apps and the .NET Core Tools.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet` 命令用于启动应用和 .NET Core 工具。

trans-unit.source: The `dotnet` command itself does not collect telemetry.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet` 命令本身不会收集遥测数据。

trans-unit.source: It is the .NET Core Tools that are run via the `dotnet` command that collect telemetry.
trans-unit.target: 而是通过 `dotnet` 命令运行的 .NET Core 工具收集遥测数据。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core commands (telemetry is not enabled):
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 命令（未启用遥测）：

trans-unit.source: .NET Core Tools [commands](index.md) (telemetry is enabled), such as:
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 工具[命令](index.md)（已启用遥测），如：

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行为

trans-unit.source: The .NET Core Tools telemetry feature is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认启用 .NET Core 工具遥测功能。

trans-unit.source: You can opt-out of the telemetry feature by setting an environment variable DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT (for example, `export` on macOS/Linux, `set` on Windows) to true (for example, “true”, 1).
trans-unit.target: 可通过将环境变量 DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT（例如，macOS/Linux 上的 `export`，Windows 上的 `set`）设置为 true（例如“true”, 1），选择退出遥测功能。

trans-unit.source: Data Points
trans-unit.target: 数据点

trans-unit.source: The feature collects the following pieces of data:
trans-unit.target: 该功能收集以下数据块：

trans-unit.source: The command being used (for example, “build”, “restore”)
trans-unit.target: 正在使用的命令（例如，“生成”、“恢复”）

trans-unit.source: The ExitCode of the command
trans-unit.target: 命令的 ExitCode

trans-unit.source: For test projects, the test runner being used
trans-unit.target: 对于测试项目，正在使用的测试运行程序

trans-unit.source: The timestamp of invocation
trans-unit.target: 调用的时间戳

trans-unit.source: The framework used
trans-unit.target: 使用的框架

trans-unit.source: Whether runtime IDs are present in the “runtimes” node
trans-unit.target: “运行时”节点中是否存在运行时 ID

trans-unit.source: The CLI version being used
trans-unit.target: 正在使用的 CLI 版本

trans-unit.source: The feature will not collect any personal data, such as usernames or emails.
trans-unit.target: 该功能不会收集任何个人数据，如用户名或电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: It will not scan your code and not extract any project-level data that can be considered sensitive, such as name, repo or author (if you set those in your project.json).
trans-unit.target: 它不会扫描代码，也不会提取被视为敏感信息的项目级别数据，例如名称、存储库或作者（如果在 project.json 中进行了这些设置）。

trans-unit.source: We want to know how the tools are used, not what you are building with the tools.
trans-unit.target: 我们想知道这些工具的使用方式，而不是用户通过这些工具构建的内容。

trans-unit.source: If you find sensitive data being collected, that’s a bug.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现正在收集敏感数据，则那是一个 bug。

trans-unit.source: Please [file an issue](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues) and it will be fixed.
trans-unit.target: 请[提出问题](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues)，此问题将会得到解决。

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft distribution of .NET Core is licensed with the [MICROSOFT .NET LIBRARY EULA](https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-eula).
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 的 Microsoft 分发由 [MICROSOFT .NET LIBRARY EULA](https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-eula) 授权。

trans-unit.source: This includes the “DATA” section re-printed below, to enable telemetry.
trans-unit.target: 这包括以下重新打印的“DATA”部分，以启用遥测。

trans-unit.source: [.NET NuGet packages](https://www.nuget.org/profiles/dotnetframework) use this same license but do not enable telemetry (see [Scope](#scope) above).
trans-unit.target: [.NET NuGet 包](https://www.nuget.org/profiles/dotnetframework)使用此相同的许可证，但不启用遥测（请参阅上方的[范围](#scope)）。

trans-unit.source: Disclosure
trans-unit.target: 公开

trans-unit.source: The .NET Core Tools display the following text when you first run one of the commands (for example, `dotnet restore`).
trans-unit.target: 首次运行其中一个命令（例如 `dotnet restore`）时，.NET Core 工具显示以下文本。

trans-unit.source: This "first run" experience is how Microsoft notifies you about data collection.
trans-unit.target: 此“首次运行”体验是 Microsoft 通知用户有关数据收集信息的方式。

trans-unit.source: This same experience also initially populates your NuGet cache with the libraries in the .NET Core SDK, avoiding requests to NuGet.org (or other NuGet feed) for these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 此相同体验最初也使用 .NET Core SDK 中的库填充 NuGet 缓存，从而避免针对这些库的对 NuGet.org（或其他 NuGet 源）的请求。
